items.sentence: Drink water instead of soft drinks, and you might be able to lose some weight.
You could at least try to be a bit more polite, even though it's not like you.
I won't be able to meet you tomorrow because something unexpected has come up.
Justine made short work of her opponents in her own personal variant of chess.
I have to get up early tomorrow morning, so I plan to go to bed early tonight.
